snippet: The Middle East has proved a far harsher environment for financiers than the El Dorado it was imagined to be a few years ago.
abstract: The Middle East has proved a far harsher environment for financiers than the El Dorado it was imagined to be a few years ago.

byline.original: By SARA HAMDAN and STANLEY REED

headline.main: Bankers Find It Tough to Tap Gulf Region's Wealth
